Attribute.Name: CallingOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: The organization code that the API is being invoked for. This organization will be used to retrieve pricing data and availability.

Attribute.Name: Currency
Attribute.Description: The currency used in price computation.

Attribute.Name: DemandType
Attribute.Description: The demand type to be used when determining availability for items.

Attribute.Name: EntitlementDate
Attribute.Description: The date to be used when reading entitlements. If not passed, this date defaults to the current date.

Description.div: Items within this Pricelist will be excluded from the search results.

Attribute.Name: ExecuteQueries
Attribute.Description: The flag indicates whether query-based associations were executed.

Attribute.Name: LastItemKey
Attribute.Description: Indicates the last fetched Item and may be used as restart for listing the next time.

Attribute.Name: LastRecordSet
Attribute.Description: Indicates if there are more records in the DB. The value of this attribute is set to 'Y' if there are more records than MaximumRecords provided in the input.

Attribute.Name: PriceProgramKey
Attribute.Description: The key of the price program to use to compute prices.

Attribute.Name: PriceProgramName
Attribute.Description: The name of the price program to use to compute prices. This value is used along with CallingOrganizationCode to identify a price program.

Attribute.Name: PricingDate
Attribute.Description: The date to be used when computing prices.

Attribute.Name: PurposeForDisplayClassification
Attribute.Description: If passed, the corrsponding classification path of each item for the specified purpose will be returned in the output as DisplayClassification.

Attribute.Name: SellerOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: The organization code of the Seller Organization.

Attribute.Name: TotalItemList
Attribute.Description: Number of Records returned

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.

Description.div: The attributes in this element are the values stored as AdditionalAttribute records for the ItemAttribute record under which it appears. For an Attribute configured as a derived attribute, the Value is the configured value for the derived attribute. The value itself is not assigned to the category. IsInherited flag will not appear for a derived attribute.

If ShortDescription has a value then this attribute will have the same value as the ShortDescription
If ShortDescription is blank, then this attribute is populated based on the data type of the attribute.
If data type is TEXT or BOOLEAN, then this attribute will have same value as Value attribute.
If data type is INTEGER, then this attribute will have same value as IntegerValue attribute.
If data type is DECIMAL, then this attribute will have same value as DoubleValue attribute.

The URL to the image configured by the type ATTR_VAL_IMAGE. The value is built as follows ContentID/ContentLocation. getAttributeDetails API is called to fetch the Image URL. If there are large number of allowed values for attributes and ImageURL is not configured then call to getAttributeDetails API can be avoided by removing ImageURL attribute from the API output template to improve the performance of getCompleteItemList API.
The Item ID of the variation item for this combination

If ShortDescription has a value then this attribute will have the same value as the ShortDescription
If ShortDescription is blank, then this attribute is populated based on the data type of the attribute.
If data type is TEXT or BOOLEAN, then this attribute will have same value as Value attribute.
If data type is INTEGER, then this attribute will have same value as IntegerValue attribute.
If data type is DECIMAL, then this attribute will have same value as DoubleValue attribute.
The Attribute name

This attribute is an indicator if the assigned values are different across items. This attribute is only applicable under the XPath - /ItemList/ItemAttributeGroupTypeList/ItemAttributeGroupList/ItemAttributeGroup/ItemAttributeList/ItemAttribute

If ShortDescription has a value then this attribute will have the same value as the ShortDescription
If ShortDescription is blank, then this attribute is populated based on the data type of the attribute.
If data type is TEXT or BOOLEAN, then this attribute will have same value as Value attribute.
If data type is INTEGER, then this attribute will have same value as IntegerValue attribute.
If data type is DECIMAL, then this attribute will have same value as DoubleValue attribute.
Indicates if the item has an associations whose association relationship type is meant to be displayed on the UI.

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Description.div: This attribute is an indicator if the assigned values are different across items. This attribute is only applicable under the XPath - /ItemList/ItemAttributeGroupTypeList/ItemAttributeGroupList/ItemAttributeGroup/ItemAttributeList/ItemAttribute
The associated value of ItemAttributeName for this item.

The attributes in this element are the values stored as AdditionalAttribute records for the ItemAttribute record under which it appears. For an Attribute configured as a derived attribute, the Value is the configured value for the derived attribute. The value itself is not assigned to the category. IsInherited flag will not appear for a derived attribute.

If ShortDescription is blank, then this attribute is populated based on the data type of the attribute.
If data type is TEXT or BOOLEAN, then this attribute will have same value as Value attribute.
If data type is INTEGER, then this attribute will have same value as IntegerValue attribute.
If data type is DECIMAL, then this attribute will have same value as DoubleValue attribute.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.

Element.Description: The inventory details of a specific serial number for the item, retrieved from SIM microservice. Check the response model here https://developer.ibm.com/api/view/storeinventory-prod:store-inventory-management:title-IBM_Store_Inventory_Management_APIs#125133

Attribute.Name: ComponentDescription
Attribute.Description: Description of the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemGroupCode
Attribute.Description: Item Group Code for the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemID
Attribute.Description: Along with ComponentOrganizationCode and ComponentUnitOfMeasure, it identifies a component item.

Attribute.Name: ComponentItemKey
Attribute.Description: Component item's primary key

Attribute.Name: ComponentKitCode
Attribute.Description: Item Kit Code for the Component Item

Attribute.Name: ComponentOrganizationCode
Attribute.Description: Organization that maintains catalog

Attribute.Name: ComponentUnitOfMeasure
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure for the Component Item

Description.div: This attribute is an indicator if the assigned values are different across items. This attribute is only applicable under the XPath - /ItemList/ItemAttributeGroupTypeList/ItemAttributeGroupList/ItemAttributeGroup/ItemAttributeList/ItemAttribute
The associated value of ItemAttributeName for this item.

Attribute.Name: DisplayItemDescription
Attribute.Description: User defined description of the item.

Attribute.Name: IsValid
Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether the item is valid.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolume
Attribute.Description: Calculated volume of one unit of item quantity.

Attribute.Name: UnitVolumeUOM
Attribute.Description: Unit of measure in which the item volume is measured.

Description.div: A list of child items of an item with variations.

Description.div: The unique identifier for the asset.
Primary key attribute of YFS_ASSET.
Unique ID of the asset in the external location.
External location of the asset.
Size of the asset.
Description of the asset.
The locale for which output should be returned in. Locale should be passed in the standard format of "language_country_variant" (e.g., "fr_FR", "en_US_CA", etc.).
Label of the asset.
Label of the asset.

Attribute.Name: Type
Attribute.Description: The association type, such as "CrossSell" or "Supersession".

Attribute.Name: IsItemSuperseded
Attribute.Description:
This flag indicates if this item has been superseded.
Valid Values: Y , N

Element.Description:
The computed price for the item, based on pricing information passed. If the YFSGetExternalPricesForItemListUE user exit is implemented, this will represent the information returned from the user exit instead.
The pricing information obtained will be for 1 unit of quantity. The QuantityRangePriceList element will display the UnitPrice for other quantity amounts if deprecated pricing engine is used. If the deprecated pricing engine is not used, the QuantityRangePriceList element will display the UnitPrice for quantity amounts if the UnitPrice returned is not in a quantity tier.

Description.div: The total price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the Item.
The total cost of the Item's bundle based on the bundle pricing strategy.
The list price of the Item.
The retail price of the Item.
The unit price of the Item, factoring in Adjustments and AdditionalLinePrices.
Price for quantity range.
Break high quantity for the quantity range.
Break low quantity for the quantity range.
Link to YFS_REGION table.
The unit price of the quantity range.

Element.Description: The available quantity for the item, either computed or obtained from cache. When GetAvailabilityFromCache is passed as N, this availability is based on the FulfillmentType if passed, or the total quantity available from ship nodes in the default distribution group for the CallingOrganizationCode's primary enterprise otherwise. When GetAvailabilityFromCache is passed as Y, the availability is obtained from InventoryAlerts which was computed and populated by Real-time Availability Monitor.

Attribute.Name: CurrentAvailableQty
Attribute.Description: The quantity currently available for the item. Only applicable when GetAvailabilityFromCache is N. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).

Description.div: This indicates the available quantity. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).

Attribute.Name: EffectiveStartDate
Attribute.Description: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective from. Calculated based on the last RTAM execution time or the last EffectiveUntilDate.

Description.div: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective until.This is calculated based on earliest timestamp of the computed date of each node. The computed date of each node is computed based on the last cut-off time of the ship date and subtract back the minimum notification time based on the node's shipping calendar.
This flag indicates whether the AvailableQuantity is based on on-hand supply.
The date when this inventory is available.
The associated value of ItemAttributeName for this item.

Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.

Attribute.Name: HasDeliveryServiceAssociated
Attribute.Description: This flag signifies if any delivery service is associated or not.

Attribute.Description: This flag signifies if any provided service is associated or not.

Element.Description: Information on a currently available promotion for the item. This data is not persisted, it is retrieved from the YFSGetPromotionsForItemListUE user exit. The attributes provided are sample attributes; as there is no logic around these promotions in the output, the YFSGetPromotionsForItemListUE user exit may return any attributes.

Attribute.Name: LongDescription
Attribute.Description: A long description of the promotion.

Attribute.Name: ShortDescription
Attribute.Description: A short description of the promotion.

Attribute.Name: URL
Attribute.Description: A URL associated with the promotion.

Element.Description: The available quantity for the item, either computed or obtained from cache. When GetAvailabilityFromCache is passed as N, this availability is based on the FulfillmentType if passed, or the total quantity available from ship nodes in the default distribution group for the CallingOrganizationCode's primary enterprise otherwise. When GetAvailabilityFromCache is passed as Y, the availability is obtained from InventoryAlerts which was computed and populated by Real-time Availability Monitor.

Attribute.Name: CurrentAvailableQty
Attribute.Description: The quantity currently available for the item. Only applicable when GetAvailabilityFromCache is N. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).

Description.div: This indicates the available quantity. If inventory is not tracked, unplanned, or infinite, the value may be Java's Integer.MAX_VALUE, Java's Long.MAX_VALUE, or the RealisticQuantityForInfiniteInventory property (if set).

Attribute.Name: EffectiveStartDate
Attribute.Description: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective from. Calculated based on the last RTAM execution time or the last EffectiveUntilDate.

Description.div: The timestamp for which the ShipDate is effective until.This is calculated based on earliest timestamp of the computed date of each node. The computed date of each node is computed based on the last cut-off time of the ship date and subtract back the minimum notification time based on the node's shipping calendar.
This flag indicates whether the AvailableQuantity is based on on-hand supply.
The date when this inventory is available.

Element.Description:
The computed price for the item, based on pricing information passed. If the YFSGetExternalPricesForItemListUE user exit is implemented, this will represent the information returned from the user exit instead.
The pricing information obtained will be for 1 unit of quantity. The QuantityRangePriceList element will display the UnitPrice for other quantity amounts if deprecated pricing engine is used. If the deprecated pricing engine is not used, the QuantityRangePriceList element will display the UnitPrice for quantity amounts if the UnitPrice returned is not in a quantity tier.

Description.div: The total price for all non-informational Additional Line Prices for the Item.
The total cost of the Item's bundle based on the bundle pricing strategy.

The retail price of the Item.
The unit price of the Item, factoring in Adjustments and AdditionalLinePrices.
Price for quantity range.
Break high quantity for the quantity range.
Break low quantity for the quantity range.
Link to YFS_REGION table.
The unit price of the quantity range.
